structure.unit: COUNTIES, CITIES, AND OTHER LOCAL UNITS
SHERIFFS, CONSTABLES, AND COUNTY POLICE FORCE

law.text: Every obligation taken by any officer, by color of his office, from a person in his custody, in any manner or form other than that especially provided by law, shall be void, but unnecessary conditions in the obligations shall not vitiate it.
law.history: Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 4569.
